actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide assistance for specific neighborhood conservation and revitalization projects, to improve the capabilities of neighborhood organizations in planning and carrying out such projects, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Neighborhood Self-Help Development Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to make grants to provide other forms of assistance to neighborhood organizations for planning and carrying out housing, economic, and community development, and for neighborhood conservation and revitalization projects.

titles.title: A bill to provide assistance for specific neighborhood conservation and revitalization projects, to improve the capabilities of neighborhood organizations in planning and carrying out such projects, and for other purposes.
